page.title: 04TOURISM IN PENNARD.
page.content: TOURISTS COME TO PENNARD A LOT BECAUSE OF THE NATURAL SURROUNDINGS AND LITTER FREE BEACHES. TOURISM IN PENNARD IS GOOD FOR THE LOCAL SHOPS BUT SOMETIMES IT IS NOT SO GOOD FOR THE NATURAL SURROUNDINGS.I THINK THAT MOST PEOPLE DONT LIKE TOURISTS IF THEY DROP LITTER IN THE AREA. TOURISTS OFTEN COME IN CARAVANS OR TENTS. FARMERS IN THE AREA LET THEM CAMP ON THEIR LAND AND PARK THEIR CARAVANS IF THEY WANT TO. TOURISM ALSO HAS A LOT OF EFFECT ON THE BEACHES, SOME DROP LITTER AND SOME JUST HAVE A GOOD TIME. THIS MEANS THE BEACHES ARE MOSTLY FULL IN SUMMER. TOURISTS SEEM TO LIKE THE CLIFFS IN PENNARD,BECAUSE THEY ALWAYS SEEM TO HAVE PEOPLE WALKING OR SUN BATHING ON THE ROCKS IN THE SUN.
